MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G77 postcode area of Newton Mearns. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have been working on site and in order to complete a permanent repair, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:20pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55pm on Monday, 14th December 2020
